name: TheUmbrellaGame (September Beta)
description:
The Umbrella Game

Controls

W - Moves the umbrella directly forward but adds weight to the front, which pulls the umbrella down slightly.

S - Slow the umbrella down

A and D - Adds torque to the umbrella to rotate it either clockwise or counterclockwise

Q - Creates wind to move the umbrella upwards.

E - Folds the umbrella up to move downwards.

J - Talk to NPC's

K - Interact with objects in the game world

Space - Pause the game

Press R to restart.
